description: Small but Powerful:Lipstick design at only 2.57oz, fit easily into your pocket, purse or bag. A whopping 3000mAh capacity enable you run your iPhone 5 for another 6hrs.Extra Flashlight Function:The only external battery chargers on Amazon that have 3 modes flashlight function. Great for Camping, Riding and Nocturnal lighting.Charge Multiple Devices:Standard USB output, compatible with any mobile devices with DC 5V input. Charge your mobile devices while it is charged.Specification:Capacity: 3000mAhInput: DC 5V / 1A (Standard Micro USB Port)Output: DC 5V / 1AWarranty: 12 Months WarrantySize: 4.17" x 0.9" x 0.9"Weight: 2.57 oz.Compatibility:- iPhone 5S 5C 5 4S 4,iPod (please use the original 8Pin / 30Pin Cable from Apple)-1 x Micro USB Connector:HTC:One X, S, V/Sensation XE XL/EVO 4G/Radar 4G/Inspire 4G/ ThunderBoltSamsung:Galaxy S4/S3/Note 3/Note 2/S2 /Nexus/Galaxy Note/Focus S/InfuseGoogle:Nexus 5, Nexus 4, Google glassMotorola:Droid Razr, Bionic/Atrix 2/riumph- Other cell phone, MP3, MP4, digital camera, and other with DC 5V inputPackage Includes:- 1 * RAVPower Power Bank RP-PB08- 1 * USB to Micro USB cable- 1 * User Guide
title: RAVPower Luster Mini 3000mAh Portable Charger Lipstick-Sized External Battery Pack Power Bank Charger (Ultra Bright Flashlight with High/Low/Strobe Modes, 5V/1A Output) for iPhone 5S, 5C, 5, 4S, 4, iPod (Lightning Cable not Provided); Samsung Galaxy S5, S4, S3, S2, Note 2; Nexus 5, Nexus 4, HTC Sensation, One X V One X V S, EVO 4G, Thunderbolt; Nokia Lumia 1020, 920 900 N9; Motorola Razr; LG Google Nexu 4 and other Android & Apple Device, Smart Phones, Tablets - Black
